title.rendered: Driving Momentum for Your Agency & Your Clients with Shama Hyder – Deep-Dive Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597242060346{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Driving Momentum for Your Agency & Your Clients with Shama Hyder

[vc_text_separator title=”Deep-dive Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1597244890286{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843633842{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Trailblazing, award-winning entrepreneur Shama Hyder joins SharpSpring CEO Rick Carlson for a deep-dive Q&A about how agencies can help reveal and drive momentum for their own businesses and help their clients do the same.

Named the “Zen Master of Marketing” by Entrepreneur magazine and honored at both the White House and The United Nations as one of the top 100 young entrepreneurs in the country, Shama’s expertise is one you don’t want to miss!

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with other top influencers in digital marketing like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Rand Fishkin, Neil Patel and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Shama Hyder

CEO, Zen Media, Visionary Strategist & Bestselling Author

Shama Hyder is a visionary strategist for the digital age, a web and TV personality, a bestselling author, and the award-winning CEO of Zen Media – a global marketing and digital PR firm. She has been named the “Zen Master of Marketing” by Entrepreneur Magazine and the “Millennial Master of the Universe” by FastCompany.com. Shama has also been honored at both the White House and The United Nations as one of the top 100 young entrepreneurs in the country.read more...

Rick Carlson

CEO/Founder, SharpSpring

Rick is founder and CEO of SharpSpring. He started with the goal of bringing marketing analytics and automation tools to small and medium businesses on an affordable and easy-to-use SaaS platform. Rick has more than 15 years of executive management experience in the technology sector, holding president, CEO, general manager, and board positions at several successful Internet security companies.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1597245028583{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-35-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
